wikitext.*:
'''Banakil''' is the [[Westron]] name for the [[Hobbits]], meaning literally 'halfling'.<ref>{{App|Translation}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''[[ban(a)]]'' means "half", and ''[[-kil]]'' is an ending meaning "person"
==Cognates==
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[Perian]]''
*[[Quenya]] ''[[Periando]]''
